text: It was signed by 60 Labour M.P.s, many of them Left-wing sympathisers. It condemned "the pollution of the world's atmosphere as a crime against humanity." A personal letter of protest against the tests from Canon Collins, chairman of the Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament, addressed to Mr. Khruschev, was also taken to the Russian Embassy.
